body:
#### PR description:

In python3, dict no longer has an iteritems method.

#### PR validation:

Tested the code in CMSSW_11_0_DEVEL_X_2019-06-11-2300 by executing step3 of workflow 1.0 which was failing in the IB.
title: Fix python3 interface problem in RecoTauTag/RecoTau
